channel.title: BMS: Black Mesa Swarm
channel.description: I just thought that this is kind of cool. [url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-swarm[/url] Discuss?:retard:

item.title: BMS: Black Mesa Swarm
item.dc:creator: rx33gundam
item.description:
russilker:

The whole thing is definitely a joke.

From their forum page:

Both from devs, no more than a month ago. Also moddb says release date is in 2012 which again makes this seem like a joke

Sorry if i pointed out an obvious fact, but I expected this to be real. The idea itself I think is good if it wasn’t a troll project like School Shootout, which coincidentally, is also a very good idea
EDIT: good idea for a mod, not a real life occurrence

Now that we know it’s a joke… It’s still possible that someone will try and do it. Positive thinking anyone?:retard::meh:

Read full topic

item.description:
russilker:

The whole thing is definitely a joke.

item.title: BMS: Black Mesa Swarm
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
Sounds to me like some guys that are butthurt that Black Mesa isn’t out yet, and they’re taking the lazy route to “outdo” a team that has been working for 6 years to redo the entire game.

Read full topic

item.title: BMS: Black Mesa Swarm
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
The whole thing is definitely a joke.

From their forum page:

We plan to release the whole thing in 2010. Expect no media updates until then, because pressing the screenshot button takes too much effort and we would rather work on the mod.

Pretty much. We’re on track for a 2009 release!

Both from devs, no more than a month ago. Also moddb says release date is in 2012 which again makes this seem like a joke

Sorry if i pointed out an obvious fact, but I expected this to be real. The idea itself I think is good if it wasn’t a troll project like School Shootout, which coincidentally, is also a very good idea
EDIT: good idea for a mod, not a real life occurrence

Read full topic

item.title: BMS: Black Mesa Swarm
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
Maxey:

It’s a good idea but the devs must be fully retarded if they think a remake of HL in top down view is more adequate than a first person remake.

First person mode, problem solved.

They really should just go for a black mesa look with a few levels that would be recognized from the original but attempt to stray away from the original storyline/maps.

Read full topic

item.title: BMS: Black Mesa Swarm
item.dc:creator: FFFUUU
item.description:
Well, it’s certainly an experiment, but I wouldn’t think about releasing it, well, maybe, I really don’t know if this is a good idea, or bad, or just neutral. It really isn’t made for coop game play, we all know that, and some parts would have to be cut and stuff due to the movement limits in Alien Swarm (Such as not being able to climb ladders, jump, etc.) So it really isn’t that bad of an idea, but shouldn’t be considered.

Read full topic
